reviewText: He shows that Jesus was considered both God and Man by the Gnostics. But what I found even more interesting was him showing the Jews  thought that God was one essence - but was two (beings?) at the same time. Rabbi's would argue about this and so on. This concept of God being two beings in one being was out-lawed in the 2nd century A.D.by the Rabbi's  because it gave too much credit to these crazy Christians.
